description: This iteration of a classic Polo jacket is rendered in breathable, lightweight linen and detailed with genuine horn buttons.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 29" front body length, a 28.5" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 59" chest, and a 38.5" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.

Size Tall 2L has a 32" front body length, a 31.5" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 59" chest, and a 40.6" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1.25" between sizes.
Mockneck. Two-button throat latch. Genuine horn buttons. Full-zip front with leather zipper pull.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Two front waist buttoned pockets. Interior left waist pocket.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back hem. Fully lined.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Shell: 100% linen. Body lining: 100% cotton. Sleeve lining: 100% nylon.
